page.title: 09CHEADLE HULME.
page.content: Cheadle Hulme is a mainly residential area.There are a wide variety of houses,from the unusual 17th century hall to the prosperous detached houses of the late 60's and 70's.Employment in the area is mainly in offices or in the service industries. Services within Cheadle Hulme include Fire Station,Telephone Exchange,P.O.Sorting Office,AA Regional Offices and a Police Station.{Cheadle Hulme Police {Station}covers nearly half of Stockport.150 Police Officers work there.The most common crime is burglary.There are three small cells in the station.People who are charged are finger-printed,photographed or breathalised.The policeman who took us round is a community policeman.This means that he makes himself known to everybody in the area and if they have any police problems they can tell him.
